title: ‘Become a Brand Master’ Branding Course with Jacob Cass
description: Dive deep into the world of branding and learn how to create a brand that truly resonates with your audience, with this branding course led by Jacob Cass.
author: Jacob Cass
excerpt: Dive deep into the world of branding and learn how to create a brand that truly resonates with your audience, with this branding course led by Jacob Cass.
text: We independently research, test, review, and recommend the best products—learn more about our process. If you buy something through our links, we may earn a commission. Become a brand master! Go behind the scenes of a major project with Jacob Cass and learn: Research, Strategy & Workshops Concept Development Logo & Brand Design Watch the trailer below or simply click here to take the course. Three Core Learning Modules Research & Strategy Concept Development Design & Execution Includes permanent access, downloadable files and high quality video. Bonuses Brand Workshop Template Brand Strategy Workbook Branding Briefcase (100s of Free Branding & Design Resources) Class Project Branding Course: Logo & Brand Design Process with Jacob Cass Are you ready to take your branding skills to the next level? Say goodbye to generic and lacklustre brands and hello to powerful, strategic brands that make a lasting impact. Introducing the ultimate branding course led by the renowned branding expert, Jacob Cass. Get ready to dive deep into the world of branding and learn how to create a brand that truly resonates with your audience. With Jacob’s expert guidance, you’ll learn how to conduct insightful market research, lead effective brand workshops, generate creative ideas, and bring your brand to life! But this course isn’t just theory. You’ll have the chance to put your new skills to the test with a hands-on branding project, where you’ll apply everything you’ve learned. And the bonuses? They’re not just any old extras. You’ll receive a Brand Workshop template, a Brand Strategy Workbook, and Jacob’s very own “Branding Briefcase” filled with top-notch design and branding resources that you won’t find anywhere else. Whether you’re a beginner or a seasoned pro, this course is perfect for anyone looking to elevate their branding game. Are you ready to create a brand that truly stands out? Join us. Become a brand master. html:
We independently research, test, review, and recommend the best products—learn more about our process. If you buy something through our links, we may earn a commission.

Become a brand master! Go behind the scenes of a major project with Jacob Cass and learn:

  1. Research, Strategy & Workshops
  2. Concept Development
  3. Logo & Brand Design

Watch the trailer below or simply click here to take the course.

Branding Course Trailer

Branding Course Details

  • Instructor: Jacob Cass
  • Length: Value-packed 48 minutes (No fluff, professionally edited.)

Three Core Learning Modules

  1. Research & Strategy
  2. Concept Development
  3. Design & Execution

Includes permanent access, downloadable files and high quality video.

Bonuses

  • Brand Workshop Template
  • Brand Strategy Workbook
  • Branding Briefcase (100s of Free Branding & Design Resources)
  • Class Project

Branding Course: Logo & Brand Design Process with Jacob Cass

Are you ready to take your branding skills to the next level?

Say goodbye to generic and lacklustre brands and hello to powerful, strategic brands that make a lasting impact.

Introducing the ultimate branding course led by the renowned branding expert, Jacob Cass.

Get ready to dive deep into the world of branding and learn how to create a brand that truly resonates with your audience.

With Jacob’s expert guidance, you’ll learn how to conduct insightful market research, lead effective brand workshops, generate creative ideas, and bring your brand to life!

But this course isn’t just theory.

You’ll have the chance to put your new skills to the test with a hands-on branding project, where you’ll apply everything you’ve learned.

And the bonuses? They’re not just any old extras.

You’ll receive a Brand Workshop template, a Brand Strategy Workbook, and Jacob’s very own “Branding Briefcase” filled with top-notch design and branding resources that you won’t find anywhere else.

Whether you’re a beginner or a seasoned pro, this course is perfect for anyone looking to elevate their branding game.

Are you ready to create a brand that truly stands out?

Join us. Become a brand master.

Branding Course Modules

RESEARCH & STRATEGY

  1. Conducting market research & planning
  2. Facilitating a brand workshop
  3. Defining a brand’s purpose, vision, mission, values
  4. Outlining customer personas & brand personality
  5. Creating a solid creative brief

CONCEPT DEVELOPMENT

  1. Generating ideas, developing and refining concepts
  2. Exploring typography, color, composition, and symbolism
  3. Presenting & finalizing direction(s)

DESIGN & EXECUTION

  1. Creating brand guidelines
  2. Producing deliverables
  3. Testing, refining, and evolving the brand

SUMMARY & CLASS PROJECT

  1. Recap of key takeaways, tips & best practices
  2. Class project to learn

Feedback & Testimonials

  • Best Branding Courses
  • Best Brand Strategy Courses
  • Best Naming Courses Online
  • Best Logo Design Resources
  • Best Logo Design Courses
  • Best Free Graphic Design Courses

About Jacob Cass

Jacob Cass is a brand designer & strategist, educator, podcaster, business coach and the founder of JUST Creative, an award-winning branding & design consultancy that doubles as an industry-leading blog. Get in touch.
